title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate and pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node and browsers via a lightweight wrapper.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embeddings for chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; manage models, chat histories and multi-user sessions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming and embedding support; Maven Central available.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem that exposes Ollama’s REST endpoints with idiomatic Ruby objects.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt history, templating and batch jobs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as inline coding copilots.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for retrieval-augmented pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C#/.NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Open-WebUI and GPU runtime configurations.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node-selector and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings and LlamaIndex to chat with local PDFs entirely offline.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that exposes Ollama models as slash commands with per-user rate limits.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that streams Ollama responses into threads and supports model switching via emoji.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and a NixOS module for declarative GPU-accelerated service deployment.

title: ollama-distroless
summary: Distroless Docker images for Ollama reducing attack surface and image size by 60%.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models for scalable batch inference with autoscaling replicas.
